entry.title: $2699 // ****GUT RENOVATED****PRIME ASTORIA****ONSITE PARKING****2 BEDROOM
entry.content:
****GUT RENOVATED****PRIME ASTORIA****ONSITE PARKING****2 BEDROOM

Listing ID #: 169431
Price: $2,699
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: No Pets

Apartment Amenities

Dishwasher
Eat In Kitchen
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Renovated

GUT RENOVATED Spacious two bedroom apartment featuring new hardwood flooring and high ceilings throughout. Large windows bring in abundant natural sunlight. Granite kitchen with top of the line stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. Tons of cabinetry for all your storage needs. **HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED** This unit is located in a prime Astoria with everything you need just steps away. 1 block away from 30th avenue. Just a short 3 minute walk to the N/W subway lines and just 7 minutes Away from midtown Manhattan. Plenty of Restaurants, supermarkets and coffee shops just steps away. Multiple choices of gyms and banks near by for your convenience. FOR VIEWINGS CALL or TEXT Mashud Ahmed at 917-355-4162 OR EMAIL [email protected]
